A discourse of natural and reveal'd religion in several essays, or, The light of nature a guide to divine truth. Nourse, Timothy, d. 1699.
[4], 363 [i.e. 379], [1] p.
Printed for John Newton ..., London : 1691.
Another edition issued late in the same year bears the author's name. "Licensed May 18th 1691"--p. 2. Advertisement on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
